title: Online Mathematics Leveling Program for Engineering Freshmen

context.additional_context: Customized math leveling program using a smartphone-based online diagnostic platform. Provides personalized learning pathways based on diagnostic test results and measures academic achievement through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Achieve over 90% accuracy in personalized competency diagnostics for essential engineering mathematics (calculus, linear algebra, etc.)
Maintain weekly learning participation rates above 80% through online platforms
Cultivate the ability to develop personalized learning plans based on individual learning gap analysis
Improve project-based assessment scores by over 20% reflecting enhanced foundational math competencies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
